name: CRUSADE (itch)
description:
CRUSADE is about a nameless warrior fighting desperately against the horrors of an ancient labyrinth in an effort to defeat the Old Gods. It features melee combat in a top-down rogue-lite environment against twisted and towering enemies.

Key Features:

  • 50+ items to aid you on your journey
  • 45+ enemies encountered in the dungeon
  • 1,000+ randomly generated boss monsters
  • Classic rogue-like features such as deities who may bless or curse you
  • No cut-scenes or complicated plot- just pure fun
  • 15+ hours of gameplay
  • Very difficult
  • Original soundtrack
  • Very replayable

Secret Features:

  • Alternate path only available to those who've beaten the game
  • Secret floor
  • Shops and evil shops
  • Mysterious shrines
  • Staircases
  • Magical scrolls
